ReferenceData.String:
FILE OPTIONS
-f <.xtc/.trr/...> (path/to/long/trajectory/name.xtc) (Input) File name option with a long value: xtc trr cpt trj gro g96 pdb g87 tng -f2 <.xtc/.trr/...> (path/to/long/trajectory.xtc) (Input) File name option with a long value: xtc trr cpt trj gro g96 pdb g87 tng -lib <.xtc/.trr/...> (path/to/long/trajectory/name.xtc) (Input, Opt., Lib.) File name option with a long value and type: xtc trr cpt trj gro g96 pdb g87 tng -longfileopt <.dat> (deffile.dat) (Input, Opt.) File name option with a long name -longfileopt2 <.dat> (path/to/long/file/name.dat) (Input, Opt., Lib.) File name option with multiple long fields
